466 //Movimenta os cursores
467 if(cursorP1ConfirmFX==cursorConfirmTimer)
468 {
469 if(P[1].key_JOY_RIGHT_status==1){ moverCursorP1=1; if(cursorP1coluna<QtdeColunas){cursorP1coluna++;}else{cursorP1coluna=1;} }
470 if(P[1].key_JOY_LEFT_status ==1){ moverCursorP1=1; if(cursorP1coluna>1){cursorP1coluna--;}else{cursorP1coluna=QtdeColunas;} }
471 if(P[1].key_JOY_UP_status ==1){ moverCursorP1=1; if(cursorP1linha<QtdeLinhas){cursorP1linha++;}else{cursorP1linha=1;} }
472 if(P[1].key_JOY_DOWN_status ==1){ moverCursorP1=1; if(cursorP1linha>1){cursorP1linha--;}else{cursorP1linha=QtdeLinhas;} }
473 }
474
475 if(cursorP2ConfirmFX==cursorConfirmTimer)
476 {
477 if(P[2].key_JOY_RIGHT_status==1){ moverCursorP2=1; if(cursorP2coluna<QtdeColunas){cursorP2coluna++;}else{cursorP2coluna=1;} }
478 if(P[2].key_JOY_LEFT_status ==1){ moverCursorP2=1; if(cursorP2coluna>1){cursorP2coluna--;}else{cursorP2coluna=QtdeColunas;} }
479 if(P[2].key_JOY_UP_status ==1){ moverCursorP2=1; if(cursorP2linha<QtdeLinhas){cursorP2linha++;}else{cursorP2linha=1;} }
480 if(P[2].key_JOY_DOWN_status ==1){ moverCursorP2=1; if(cursorP2linha>1){cursorP2linha--;}else{cursorP2linha=QtdeLinhas;} }
481 }
482
483 //Mapeamento dos personagens
484 /*
485 1 2 3 4 coluna
486 +-------+-------+-------+-------+
487 1 | char1 | char2 | char3 | char4 |
488 +-------+-------+-------+-------+
489 2 | char5 | char6 | char7 | char8 |
490 +-------+-------+-------+-------+
491 linha
492 */
493
494 if(moverCursorP1==1) //P1
495 {
496 XGM_setPCM(P1_SFX, snd_cursor, sizeof(snd_cursor)); XGM_startPlayPCM(P1_SFX, 1, SOUND_PCM_CH3);
497
498 //atribuicao de ID
499 if(cursorP1coluna==1 && cursorP1linha==1){ cursorP1_ID=1; }
500 if(cursorP1coluna==2 && cursorP1linha==1){ cursorP1_ID=2; }
501 if(cursorP1coluna==3 && cursorP1linha==1){ cursorP1_ID=1; }
502 if(cursorP1coluna==4 && cursorP1linha==1){ cursorP1_ID=2; }
503 if(cursorP1coluna==1 && cursorP1linha==2){ cursorP1_ID=2; }
504 if(cursorP1coluna==2 && cursorP1linha==2){ cursorP1_ID=1; }
505 if(cursorP1coluna==3 && cursorP1linha==2){ cursorP1_ID=2; }
506 if(cursorP1coluna==4 && cursorP1linha==2){ cursorP1_ID=1; }
507 P[1].id = cursorP1_ID;
508
509 //Movimentacao de Sprite do cursor
510 SPR_setPosition(GE[1].sprite, 96+((cursorP1coluna-1)*tamanhoDoIcone), 148+((cursorP1linha-1)*tamanhoDoIcone));
511
512 //Update Visual Char
513 if (GE[3].sprite){ SPR_releaseSprite(GE[3].sprite); GE[3].sprite = NULL; }
514 if (GE[5].sprite){ SPR_releaseSprite(GE[5].sprite); GE[5].sprite = NULL; }
515
516 if(cursorP1_ID==1)
517 {
518 GE[3].sprite = SPR_addSpriteExSafe(&spr_haohmaru_001, 16, 16, TILE_ATTR(PAL2, FALSE, FALSE, FALSE), SPR_FLAG_AUTO_VISIBILITY | SPR_FLAG_AUTO_VRAM_ALLOC | SPR_FLAG_AUTO_TILE_UPLOAD | SPR_FLAG_AUTO_VRAM_ALLOC);
519 PAL_setPalette(PAL2, spr_haohmaru_001.palette->data, CPU);
520 GE[5].sprite = SPR_addSpriteExSafe(&spr_haohmaru_100CS, 8, 98-8, TILE_ATTR(PAL2, FALSE, FALSE, FALSE), SPR_FLAG_AUTO_VISIBILITY | SPR_FLAG_AUTO_VRAM_ALLOC | SPR_FLAG_AUTO_TILE_UPLOAD | SPR_FLAG_AUTO_VRAM_ALLOC);
521 }
522 if(cursorP1_ID==2)
523 {
524 GE[3].sprite = SPR_addSpriteExSafe(&spr_gillius_001, 16, 16, TILE_ATTR(PAL2, FALSE, FALSE, FALSE), SPR_FLAG_AUTO_VISIBILITY | SPR_FLAG_AUTO_VRAM_ALLOC | SPR_FLAG_AUTO_TILE_UPLOAD | SPR_FLAG_AUTO_VRAM_ALLOC);
525 PAL_setPalette(PAL2, spr_gillius_001.palette->data, CPU);
526 GE[5].sprite = SPR_addSpriteExSafe(&spr_gillius_100CS, -14, 124-8, TILE_ATTR(PAL2, FALSE, FALSE, FALSE), SPR_FLAG_AUTO_VISIBILITY | SPR_FLAG_AUTO_VRAM_ALLOC | SPR_FLAG_AUTO_TILE_UPLOAD | SPR_FLAG_AUTO_VRAM_ALLOC);
527 }
528 }//---end P1
529
530 if(moverCursorP2==1) //P2
531 {
532 XGM_setPCM(P2_SFX, snd_cursor, sizeof(snd_cursor)); XGM_startPlayPCM(P2_SFX, 1, SOUND_PCM_CH4);
533
534 //atribuicao de ID
535 if(cursorP2coluna==1 && cursorP2linha==1){ cursorP2_ID=1; }
536 if(cursorP2coluna==2 && cursorP2linha==1){ cursorP2_ID=2; }
537 if(cursorP2coluna==3 && cursorP2linha==1){ cursorP2_ID=1; }
538 if(cursorP2coluna==4 && cursorP2linha==1){ cursorP2_ID=2; }
539 if(cursorP2coluna==1 && cursorP2linha==2){ cursorP2_ID=2; }
540 if(cursorP2coluna==2 && cursorP2linha==2){ cursorP2_ID=1; }
541 if(cursorP2coluna==3 && cursorP2linha==2){ cursorP2_ID=2; }
542 if(cursorP2coluna==4 && cursorP2linha==2){ cursorP2_ID=1; }
543 P[2].id = cursorP2_ID;
544
545 //Movimentacao de Sprite do cursor
546 SPR_setPosition(GE[2].sprite, 96+((cursorP2coluna-1)*tamanhoDoIcone), 148+((cursorP2linha-1)*tamanhoDoIcone));
547
548 //Update Visual Char
549 if (GE[4].sprite){ SPR_releaseSprite(GE[4].sprite); GE[4].sprite = NULL; }
550 if (GE[6].sprite){ SPR_releaseSprite(GE[6].sprite); GE[6].sprite = NULL; }
551
552 if(cursorP2_ID==1)
553 {
554 GE[4].sprite = SPR_addSpriteExSafe(&spr_haohmaru_001, 232, 16, TILE_ATTR(PAL3, FALSE, FALSE, FALSE), SPR_FLAG_AUTO_VISIBILITY | SPR_FLAG_AUTO_VRAM_ALLOC | SPR_FLAG_AUTO_TILE_UPLOAD | SPR_FLAG_AUTO_VRAM_ALLOC);
555 PAL_setPalette(PAL3, spr_haohmaru_001.palette->data, CPU);
556 GE[6].sprite = SPR_addSpriteExSafe(&spr_haohmaru_100CS, 230, 98-8, TILE_ATTR(PAL3, FALSE, FALSE, FALSE), SPR_FLAG_AUTO_VISIBILITY | SPR_FLAG_AUTO_VRAM_ALLOC | SPR_FLAG_AUTO_TILE_UPLOAD | SPR_FLAG_AUTO_VRAM_ALLOC);
557 SPR_setHFlip(GE[6].sprite, TRUE);
558 }
559 if(cursorP2_ID==2)
560 {
561 GE[4].sprite = SPR_addSpriteExSafe(&spr_gillius_001, 232, 16, TILE_ATTR(PAL3, FALSE, FALSE, FALSE), SPR_FLAG_AUTO_VISIBILITY | SPR_FLAG_AUTO_VRAM_ALLOC | SPR_FLAG_AUTO_TILE_UPLOAD | SPR_FLAG_AUTO_VRAM_ALLOC);
562 PAL_setPalette(PAL3, spr_gillius_001.palette->data, CPU);
563 GE[6].sprite = SPR_addSpriteExSafe(&spr_gillius_100CS, 228, 124-8, TILE_ATTR(PAL3, FALSE, FALSE, FALSE), SPR_FLAG_AUTO_VISIBILITY | SPR_FLAG_AUTO_VRAM_ALLOC | SPR_FLAG_AUTO_TILE_UPLOAD | SPR_FLAG_AUTO_VRAM_ALLOC);
564 }
565 SPR_setHFlip(GE[4].sprite, TRUE);
566 SPR_setHFlip(GE[6].sprite, TRUE);
567 }//---end P2
568
569 //Seleciona o Char, P1
570 if(
571 cursorP1ConfirmFX==cursorConfirmTimer && (
572 P[1].key_JOY_A_status==1 || P[1].key_JOY_B_status==1 || P[1].key_JOY_C_status==1 ||
573 P[1].key_JOY_X_status==1 || P[1].key_JOY_Y_status==1 || P[1].key_JOY_Z_status==1 ||
574 P[1].key_JOY_START_status==1 || P[1].key_JOY_MODE_status==1 )
575 )
576 {
577 cursorP1ConfirmFX--;
578 if (GE[1].sprite){ SPR_releaseSprite(GE[1].sprite); GE[1].sprite = NULL; }
579 GE[1].sprite = SPR_addSpriteExSafe(&spr_cursor_confirm, 96+((cursorP1coluna-1)*tamanhoDoIcone), 148+((cursorP1linha-1)*tamanhoDoIcone)+4, TILE_ATTR(PAL0, FALSE, FALSE, FALSE), SPR_FLAG_AUTO_VISIBILITY | SPR_FLAG_AUTO_VRAM_ALLOC | SPR_FLAG_AUTO_TILE_UPLOAD | SPR_FLAG_AUTO_VRAM_ALLOC);
580 SPR_setVRAMTileIndex(GE[1].sprite, 1441); //define uma posicao especifica para o GFX na VRAM
581 }
582 if(cursorP1ConfirmFX<cursorConfirmTimer)
583 {
584 if(cursorP1ConfirmFX>0)
585 {
586 cursorP1ConfirmFX--;
587 if(cursorP1ConfirmFX==1)
588 {
589 XGM_setPCM(P1_SFX, snd_confirm, sizeof(snd_confirm)); XGM_startPlayPCM(P1_SFX, 1, SOUND_PCM_CH3);
590
591 if (GE[1].sprite){ SPR_releaseSprite(GE[1].sprite); GE[1].sprite = NULL; }
592 GE[1].sprite = SPR_addSpriteExSafe(&spr_color_cursor, 20, 89, TILE_ATTR(PAL0, FALSE, FALSE, FALSE), SPR_FLAG_AUTO_VISIBILITY | SPR_FLAG_AUTO_VRAM_ALLOC | SPR_FLAG_AUTO_TILE_UPLOAD | SPR_FLAG_AUTO_VRAM_ALLOC);
593 }
594 }else{
595 //SELECAO DE COR!
596 u8 mudarcor=0;
597 if(P[1].key_JOY_RIGHT_status==1 && endP1Selection==0){ mudarcor=1; if(cursorP1ColorChoice<8){cursorP1ColorChoice++; }else{cursorP1ColorChoice=1;} }
598 if(P[1].key_JOY_LEFT_status ==1 && endP1Selection==0){ mudarcor=1; if(cursorP1ColorChoice>1){cursorP1ColorChoice--; }else{cursorP1ColorChoice=8;} }
599 if(mudarcor==1)
600 {
601 XGM_setPCM(P1_SFX, snd_cursor, sizeof(snd_cursor)); XGM_startPlayPCM(P1_SFX, 1, SOUND_PCM_CH3);
602
603 if(cursorP1_ID==1) //haohmaru
604 {
605 if(cursorP1ColorChoice==1){ PAL_setPalette(PAL2, spr_haohmaru_pal1_1a.palette->data, CPU); }
606 if(cursorP1ColorChoice==2){ PAL_setPalette(PAL2, spr_haohmaru_pal2_1a.palette->data, CPU); }
607 if(cursorP1ColorChoice==3){ PAL_setPalette(PAL2, spr_haohmaru_pal3_1a.palette->data, CPU); }
608 if(cursorP1ColorChoice==4){ PAL_setPalette(PAL2, spr_haohmaru_pal4_1a.palette->data, CPU); }
609 if(cursorP1ColorChoice==5){ PAL_setPalette(PAL2, spr_haohmaru_pal5_1a.palette->data, CPU); }
610 if(cursorP1ColorChoice==6){ PAL_setPalette(PAL2, spr_haohmaru_pal6_1a.palette->data, CPU); }
611 if(cursorP1ColorChoice==7){ PAL_setPalette(PAL2, spr_haohmaru_pal7_1a.palette->data, CPU); }
612 if(cursorP1ColorChoice==8){ PAL_setPalette(PAL2, spr_haohmaru_pal8_1a.palette->data, CPU); }
613 }
614 if(cursorP1_ID==2) //gillius
615 {
616 if(cursorP1ColorChoice==1){ PAL_setPalette(PAL2, spr_gillius_pal1.palette->data, CPU); }
617 if(cursorP1ColorChoice==2){ PAL_setPalette(PAL2, spr_gillius_pal2.palette->data, CPU); }
618 if(cursorP1ColorChoice==3){ PAL_setPalette(PAL2, spr_gillius_pal3.palette->data, CPU); }
619 if(cursorP1ColorChoice==4){ PAL_setPalette(PAL2, spr_gillius_pal4.palette->data, CPU); }
620 if(cursorP1ColorChoice==5){ PAL_setPalette(PAL2, spr_gillius_pal5.palette->data, CPU); }
621 if(cursorP1ColorChoice==6){ PAL_setPalette(PAL2, spr_gillius_pal6.palette->data, CPU); }
622 if(cursorP1ColorChoice==7){ PAL_setPalette(PAL2, spr_gillius_pal7.palette->data, CPU); }
623 if(cursorP1ColorChoice==8){ PAL_setPalette(PAL2, spr_gillius_pal8.palette->data, CPU); }
624 }
625 //Movimentacao de Sprite do cursor de cor
626 SPR_setPosition(GE[1].sprite, 20+((cursorP1ColorChoice-1)*8), 89);
627 }
628 if(
629 endP1Selection==0 && (
630 P[1].key_JOY_A_status==1 || P[1].key_JOY_B_status==1 || P[1].key_JOY_C_status==1 ||
631 P[1].key_JOY_X_status==1 || P[1].key_JOY_Y_status==1 || P[1].key_JOY_Z_status==1 ||
632 P[1].key_JOY_START_status==1 || P[1].key_JOY_MODE_status==1 )
633 )
634 {
635 endP1Selection=1;
636
637 XGM_setPCM(P1_SFX, snd_confirm, sizeof(snd_confirm)); XGM_startPlayPCM(P1_SFX, 1, SOUND_PCM_CH3);
638
639 if (GE[1].sprite){ SPR_releaseSprite(GE[1].sprite); GE[1].sprite = NULL; }
640 GE[1].sprite = SPR_addSpriteExSafe(&spr_color_cursor_static, 20+((cursorP1ColorChoice-1)*8), 89, TILE_ATTR(PAL0, FALSE, FALSE, FALSE), SPR_FLAG_AUTO_VISIBILITY | SPR_FLAG_AUTO_VRAM_ALLOC | SPR_FLAG_AUTO_TILE_UPLOAD | SPR_FLAG_AUTO_VRAM_ALLOC);
641 }
642 }
643 }
644
645 //Seleciona o Char, P2
646 if(
647 cursorP2ConfirmFX==cursorConfirmTimer && (
648 P[2].key_JOY_A_status==1 || P[2].key_JOY_B_status==1 || P[2].key_JOY_C_status==1 ||
649 P[2].key_JOY_X_status==1 || P[2].key_JOY_Y_status==1 || P[2].key_JOY_Z_status==1 ||
650 P[2].key_JOY_START_status==1 || P[2].key_JOY_MODE_status==1 )
651 )
652 {
653 cursorP2ConfirmFX--;
654 if (GE[2].sprite){ SPR_releaseSprite(GE[2].sprite); GE[2].sprite = NULL; }
655 GE[2].sprite = SPR_addSpriteExSafe(&spr_cursor_confirm, 96+((cursorP2coluna-1)*tamanhoDoIcone), 148+((cursorP2linha-1)*tamanhoDoIcone)+4, TILE_ATTR(PAL0, FALSE, FALSE, FALSE), SPR_FLAG_AUTO_VISIBILITY | SPR_FLAG_AUTO_VRAM_ALLOC | SPR_FLAG_AUTO_TILE_UPLOAD | SPR_FLAG_AUTO_VRAM_ALLOC);
656 SPR_setVRAMTileIndex(GE[2].sprite, 1461); //define uma posicao especifica para o GFX na VRAM
657 }
658 if(cursorP2ConfirmFX<cursorConfirmTimer)
659 {
660 if(cursorP2ConfirmFX>0)
661 {
662 cursorP2ConfirmFX--;
663 if(cursorP2ConfirmFX==1)
664 {
665 XGM_setPCM(P2_SFX, snd_confirm, sizeof(snd_confirm)); XGM_startPlayPCM(P2_SFX, 1, SOUND_PCM_CH4);
666
667 if (GE[2].sprite){ SPR_releaseSprite(GE[2].sprite); GE[2].sprite = NULL; }
668 GE[2].sprite = SPR_addSpriteExSafe(&spr_color_cursor, 237, 89, TILE_ATTR(PAL0, FALSE, FALSE, FALSE), SPR_FLAG_AUTO_VISIBILITY | SPR_FLAG_AUTO_VRAM_ALLOC | SPR_FLAG_AUTO_TILE_UPLOAD | SPR_FLAG_AUTO_VRAM_ALLOC);
669 }
670 }else{
671 //SELECAO DE COR!
672 u8 mudarcor=0;
673 if(P[2].key_JOY_RIGHT_status==1 && endP2Selection==0){ mudarcor=1; if(cursorP2ColorChoice<8){cursorP2ColorChoice++; }else{cursorP2ColorChoice=1;} }
674 if(P[2].key_JOY_LEFT_status ==1 && endP2Selection==0){ mudarcor=1; if(cursorP2ColorChoice>1){cursorP2ColorChoice--; }else{cursorP2ColorChoice=8;} }
675 if(mudarcor==1)
676 {
677 XGM_setPCM(P2_SFX, snd_cursor, sizeof(snd_cursor)); XGM_startPlayPCM(P2_SFX, 1, SOUND_PCM_CH4);
678
679 if(cursorP2_ID==1) //haohmaru
680 {
681 if(cursorP2ColorChoice==1){ PAL_setPalette(PAL3, spr_haohmaru_pal1_1a.palette->data, CPU); }
682 if(cursorP2ColorChoice==2){ PAL_setPalette(PAL3, spr_haohmaru_pal2_1a.palette->data, CPU); }
683 if(cursorP2ColorChoice==3){ PAL_setPalette(PAL3, spr_haohmaru_pal3_1a.palette->data, CPU); }
684 if(cursorP2ColorChoice==4){ PAL_setPalette(PAL3, spr_haohmaru_pal4_1a.palette->data, CPU); }
685 if(cursorP2ColorChoice==5){ PAL_setPalette(PAL3, spr_haohmaru_pal5_1a.palette->data, CPU); }
686 if(cursorP2ColorChoice==6){ PAL_setPalette(PAL3, spr_haohmaru_pal6_1a.palette->data, CPU); }
687 if(cursorP2ColorChoice==7){ PAL_setPalette(PAL3, spr_haohmaru_pal7_1a.palette->data, CPU); }
688 if(cursorP2ColorChoice==8){ PAL_setPalette(PAL3, spr_haohmaru_pal8_1a.palette->data, CPU); }
689 }
690 if(cursorP2_ID==2) //gillius
691 {
692 if(cursorP2ColorChoice==1){ PAL_setPalette(PAL3, spr_gillius_pal1.palette->data, CPU); }
693 if(cursorP2ColorChoice==2){ PAL_setPalette(PAL3, spr_gillius_pal2.palette->data, CPU); }
694 if(cursorP2ColorChoice==3){ PAL_setPalette(PAL3, spr_gillius_pal3.palette->data, CPU); }
695 if(cursorP2ColorChoice==4){ PAL_setPalette(PAL3, spr_gillius_pal4.palette->data, CPU); }
696 if(cursorP2ColorChoice==5){ PAL_setPalette(PAL3, spr_gillius_pal5.palette->data, CPU); }
697 if(cursorP2ColorChoice==6){ PAL_setPalette(PAL3, spr_gillius_pal6.palette->data, CPU); }
698 if(cursorP2ColorChoice==7){ PAL_setPalette(PAL3, spr_gillius_pal7.palette->data, CPU); }
699 if(cursorP2ColorChoice==8){ PAL_setPalette(PAL3, spr_gillius_pal8.palette->data, CPU); }
700 }
701 //Movimentacao de Sprite do cursor de cor
702 SPR_setPosition(GE[2].sprite, 237+((cursorP2ColorChoice-1)*8), 89);
703 }
704 if(
705 endP2Selection==0 && (
706 P[2].key_JOY_A_status==1 || P[2].key_JOY_B_status==1 || P[2].key_JOY_C_status==1 ||
707 P[2].key_JOY_X_status==1 || P[2].key_JOY_Y_status==1 || P[2].key_JOY_Z_status==1 ||
708 P[2].key_JOY_START_status==1 || P[2].key_JOY_MODE_status==1 )
709 )
710 {
711 endP2Selection=1;
712
713 XGM_setPCM(P2_SFX, snd_confirm, sizeof(snd_confirm)); XGM_startPlayPCM(P2_SFX, 1, SOUND_PCM_CH4);
714
715 if (GE[2].sprite){ SPR_releaseSprite(GE[2].sprite); GE[2].sprite = NULL; }
716 GE[2].sprite = SPR_addSpriteExSafe(&spr_color_cursor_static, 237+((cursorP2ColorChoice-1)*8), 89, TILE_ATTR(PAL0, FALSE, FALSE, FALSE), SPR_FLAG_AUTO_VISIBILITY | SPR_FLAG_AUTO_VRAM_ALLOC | SPR_FLAG_AUTO_TILE_UPLOAD | SPR_FLAG_AUTO_VRAM_ALLOC);
717 }
718 }
719 }
720
721 //Saida
722 if(endP1Selection==1 && endP2Selection==1){ gTimerExit--; }
723 if(gTimerExit==1)
724 {
725 if (GE[1].sprite){ SPR_releaseSprite(GE[1].sprite); GE[1].sprite = NULL; }
726 if (GE[2].sprite){ SPR_releaseSprite(GE[2].sprite); GE[2].sprite = NULL; }
727 if (GE[3].sprite){ SPR_releaseSprite(GE[3].sprite); GE[3].sprite = NULL; }
728 if (GE[4].sprite){ SPR_releaseSprite(GE[4].sprite); GE[4].sprite = NULL; }
729 if (GE[5].sprite){ SPR_releaseSprite(GE[5].sprite); GE[5].sprite = NULL; }
730 if (GE[6].sprite){ SPR_releaseSprite(GE[6].sprite); GE[6].sprite = NULL; }
731 CLEAR_VDP();
732 gFrames=0;
733 gRoom=4;
734 }
735
736 }
737
738 if(gRoom==4) //STAGE SELECT ---------------------------------------------------------------
739 {
740 FUNCAO_INPUT_SYSTEM(); //Verifica os joysticks
741
742 if(gFrames==1)
743 {
744 gInd_tileset=1;
745
746 VDP_loadTileSet(bg_stage_select_bgb.tileset,gInd_tileset,DMA);
747 VDP_setTileMapEx(BG_B,bg_stage_select_bgb.tilemap,TILE_ATTR_FULL(PAL0,0,FALSE,FALSE,gInd_tileset),0,0,0,0,40,28,DMA_QUEUE);
748 PAL_setPalette(PAL0, bg_stage_select_bgb.palette->data, CPU);
749 gInd_tileset += bg_stage_select_bgb.tileset->numTile;
750
751 VDP_loadTileSet(bg_stage1_select_bga.tileset,gInd_tileset,DMA);
752 VDP_setTileMapEx(BG_A,bg_stage1_select_bga.tilemap,TILE_ATTR_FULL(PAL1,0,FALSE,FALSE,gInd_tileset),13,11,0,0,16,8,DMA_QUEUE);
753 PAL_setPalette(PAL1, bg_stage1_select_bga.palette->data, CPU);
754 //gInd_tileset += bg_stage1_select_bga.tileset->numTile;
755
756 //Elementos Graficos
757 GE[1].sprite = SPR_addSpriteExSafe(&spr_BG_desc1, 16, 16, TILE_ATTR(PAL3, FALSE, FALSE, FALSE), SPR_FLAG_AUTO_VISIBILITY | SPR_FLAG_AUTO_VRAM_ALLOC | SPR_FLAG_AUTO_TILE_UPLOAD | SPR_FLAG_AUTO_VRAM_ALLOC);
758 PAL_setPalette(PAL3, spr_BG_desc1.palette->data, CPU);
759 GE[2].sprite = SPR_addSpriteExSafe(&kuroko_shoulder, 104, 128, TILE_ATTR(PAL2, FALSE, FALSE, FALSE), SPR_FLAG_AUTO_VISIBILITY | SPR_FLAG_AUTO_VRAM_ALLOC | SPR_FLAG_AUTO_TILE_UPLOAD | SPR_FLAG_AUTO_VRAM_ALLOC);
760 PAL_setPalette(PAL2, kuroko_shoulder.palette->data, CPU);
761 GE[3].sprite = SPR_addSpriteExSafe(&spr_stage_sel_icon, 282, 168, TILE_ATTR(PAL0, FALSE, FALSE, FALSE), SPR_FLAG_AUTO_VISIBILITY | SPR_FLAG_AUTO_VRAM_ALLOC | SPR_FLAG_AUTO_TILE_UPLOAD | SPR_FLAG_AUTO_VRAM_ALLOC);
762 }
763
764 u8 atualizaMiniatura=0;
765 u8 NumberOfStages = 3; //Inserir aqui o total de stages criados!
766
767 if(P[1].key_JOY_RIGHT_status==1 || P[2].key_JOY_RIGHT_status==1)
768 {
769 atualizaMiniatura=1;
770 gBG_Choice--;
771 if(gBG_Choice<1){gBG_Choice=NumberOfStages;}
772 }
773 if(P[1].key_JOY_LEFT_status==1 || P[2].key_JOY_LEFT_status==1)
774 {
775 atualizaMiniatura=1;
776 gBG_Choice++;
777 if(gBG_Choice>NumberOfStages){gBG_Choice=1;}
778 }
779 if(atualizaMiniatura==1)
780 {
781 XGM_setPCM(P1_SFX, snd_cursor, sizeof(snd_cursor)); XGM_startPlayPCM(P1_SFX, 1, SOUND_PCM_CH3);
782
783 //move o cursor 'gps'
784 if(gBG_Choice==1){ SPR_setPosition(GE[3].sprite, 282, 168); }
785 if(gBG_Choice==2){ SPR_setPosition(GE[3].sprite, 236, 157); }
786 if(gBG_Choice==3){ SPR_setPosition(GE[3].sprite, 176, 187); }
787
788 if (GE[1].sprite){ SPR_releaseSprite(GE[1].sprite); GE[1].sprite = NULL; }
789 if(gBG_Choice==1)
790 {
791 GE[1].sprite = SPR_addSpriteExSafe(&spr_BG_desc1, 16, 16, TILE_ATTR(PAL3, FALSE, FALSE, FALSE), SPR_FLAG_AUTO_VISIBILITY | SPR_FLAG_AUTO_VRAM_ALLOC | SPR_FLAG_AUTO_TILE_UPLOAD | SPR_FLAG_AUTO_VRAM_ALLOC);
792 PAL_setPalette(PAL3, spr_BG_desc1.palette->data, CPU);
793
794 VDP_loadTileSet(bg_stage1_select_bga.tileset,gInd_tileset,DMA);
795 VDP_setTileMapEx(BG_A,bg_stage1_select_bga.tilemap,TILE_ATTR_FULL(PAL1,0,FALSE,FALSE,gInd_tileset),13,11,0,0,16,8,DMA_QUEUE);
796 PAL_setPalette(PAL1, bg_stage1_select_bga.palette->data, CPU);
797 }
798 if(gBG_Choice==2)
799 {
800 GE[1].sprite = SPR_addSpriteExSafe(&spr_BG_desc2, 16, 16, TILE_ATTR(PAL3, FALSE, FALSE, FALSE), SPR_FLAG_AUTO_VISIBILITY | SPR_FLAG_AUTO_VRAM_ALLOC | SPR_FLAG_AUTO_TILE_UPLOAD | SPR_FLAG_AUTO_VRAM_ALLOC);
801 PAL_setPalette(PAL3, spr_BG_desc1.palette->data, CPU);
802
803 VDP_loadTileSet(bg_stage2_select_bga.tileset,gInd_tileset,DMA);
804 VDP_setTileMapEx(BG_A,bg_stage2_select_bga.tilemap,TILE_ATTR_FULL(PAL1,0,FALSE,FALSE,gInd_tileset),13,11,0,0,16,8,DMA_QUEUE);
805 PAL_setPalette(PAL1, bg_stage2_select_bga.palette->data, CPU);
806 }
807 if(gBG_Choice==3)
808 {
809 GE[1].sprite = SPR_addSpriteExSafe(&spr_BG_desc3, 16, 16, TILE_ATTR(PAL3, FALSE, FALSE, FALSE), SPR_FLAG_AUTO_VISIBILITY | SPR_FLAG_AUTO_VRAM_ALLOC | SPR_FLAG_AUTO_TILE_UPLOAD | SPR_FLAG_AUTO_VRAM_ALLOC);
810 PAL_setPalette(PAL3, spr_BG_desc1.palette->data, CPU);
811
812 VDP_loadTileSet(bg_stage3_select_bga.tileset,gInd_tileset,DMA);
813 VDP_setTileMapEx(BG_A,bg_stage3_select_bga.tilemap,TILE_ATTR_FULL(PAL1,0,FALSE,FALSE,gInd_tileset),13,11,0,0,16,8,DMA_QUEUE);
814 PAL_setPalette(PAL1, bg_stage3_select_bga.palette->data, CPU);
815 }
816 }
817
818 if(P[1].key_JOY_START_status==1 && gFrames>5){
819 if (GE[1].sprite){ SPR_releaseSprite(GE[1].sprite); GE[1].sprite = NULL; }
820 if (GE[2].sprite){ SPR_releaseSprite(GE[2].sprite); GE[2].sprite = NULL; }
821 if (GE[3].sprite){ SPR_releaseSprite(GE[3].sprite); GE[3].sprite = NULL; }
822 gRoom=9; gDescompressionExit=10;
823 gFrames=1;
824 CLEAR_VDP();
825 };
826 }
827
828 if(gRoom==9) //DESCOMPRESSION -------------------------------------------------------------
829 {
830 GE[1].sprite = SPR_addSpriteExSafe(&spr_point, 0, 225, TILE_ATTR(PAL3, FALSE, FALSE, FALSE), SPR_FLAG_AUTO_VISIBILITY | SPR_FLAG_AUTO_VRAM_ALLOC | SPR_FLAG_AUTO_TILE_UPLOAD | SPR_FLAG_AUTO_VRAM_ALLOC);
831 GE[2].sprite = SPR_addSpriteExSafe(&spr_point, 0, 225, TILE_ATTR(PAL3, FALSE, FALSE, FALSE), SPR_FLAG_AUTO_VISIBILITY | SPR_FLAG_AUTO_VRAM_ALLOC | SPR_FLAG_AUTO_TILE_UPLOAD | SPR_FLAG_AUTO_VRAM_ALLOC);
832 GE[3].sprite = SPR_addSpriteExSafe(&spr_point, 0, 225, TILE_ATTR(PAL3, FALSE, FALSE, FALSE), SPR_FLAG_AUTO_VISIBILITY | SPR_FLAG_AUTO_VRAM_ALLOC | SPR_FLAG_AUTO_TILE_UPLOAD | SPR_FLAG_AUTO_VRAM_ALLOC);
833
834 if(gFrames==20)
835 {
836 if (GE[1].sprite){ SPR_releaseSprite(GE[1].sprite); GE[1].sprite = NULL; }
837 if (GE[2].sprite){ SPR_releaseSprite(GE[2].sprite); GE[2].sprite = NULL; }
838 if (GE[3].sprite){ SPR_releaseSprite(GE[3].sprite); GE[3].sprite = NULL; }
839 gRoom=gDescompressionExit;
840 gFrames=1;
841 CLEAR_VDP();
842 }
843
844 }
845
846 if(gRoom==10) //IN GAME -------------------------------------------------------------------
847 {
848 if(gFrames == 1){ FUNCAO_INICIALIZACAO(); } //Inicializacao
849 if(gFrames<=355){
850 FUNCAO_ROUND_INIT(); //Rotina de Letreiramento de inicio dos rounds
851 }else{
852 FUNCAO_RELOGIO(); //HUD relogio
853 FUNCAO_BARRAS_DE_ENERGIA(); //HUD barras
854 }
855
856 //libera os graficos dos sparks
857 if(Spark1_countDown>0){ Spark1_countDown--; if(Spark1_countDown==1){ SPR_releaseSprite(Spark[1]); Spark[1] = NULL; } }
858 if(Spark2_countDown>0){ Spark2_countDown--; if(Spark2_countDown==1){ SPR_releaseSprite(Spark[2]); Spark[2] = NULL; } }
859
860 FUNCAO_INPUT_SYSTEM(); //Verifica os joysticks
861
862 FUNCAO_ANIMACAO(); //Atualiza animacao
863
864 FUNCAO_FSM(); //FSM = Finite State Machine (Maquina de Estados)
865
866 FUNCAO_PHYSICS(); //Funcoes de Fisica
867
868 FUNCAO_CAMERA_BGANIM();
869
870 FUNCAO_SAMSHOFX(); //Efeitos do jogo SS2
871
872 if(gDebug == 1){ FUNCAO_DEBUG(); } //Debug
873 }
874
875 if(gRoom==11) //AFTER MATCH ---------------------------------------------------------------
876 {
877 FUNCAO_INPUT_SYSTEM(); //Verifica os joysticks
878
879 if(gFrames==1)
880 {
881 gContinueOption=1;
882 gInd_tileset=1;
883 gScrollValue=0;
884 VDP_setHorizontalScroll(BG_B, gScrollValue);
885
886 //BACKGROUND
887 if(gBG_Choice==1)
888 {
889 VDP_loadTileSet(gfx_bgb1_win_screen.tileset,gInd_tileset,DMA);
890 VDP_setTileMapEx(BG_B,gfx_bgb1_win_screen.tilemap,TILE_ATTR_FULL(PAL0,0,FALSE,FALSE,gInd_tileset),0,3,0,0,40,22,DMA_QUEUE);
891 PAL_setPalette(PAL0, gfx_bgb1_win_screen.palette->data, CPU);
892 gInd_tileset += gfx_bgb1_win_screen.tileset->numTile;
893 }
894 if(gBG_Choice==2)
895 {
896 VDP_loadTileSet(gfx_bgb2_win_screen.tileset,gInd_tileset,DMA);
897 VDP_setTileMapEx(BG_B,gfx_bgb2_win_screen.tilemap,TILE_ATTR_FULL(PAL0,0,FALSE,FALSE,gInd_tileset),0,3,0,0,40,22,DMA_QUEUE);
898 PAL_setPalette(PAL0, gfx_bgb2_win_screen.palette->data, CPU);
899 gInd_tileset += gfx_bgb2_win_screen.tileset->numTile;
900 }
901
902 //WINNER
903 if(gWinnerID==1) //haohmaru
904 {
905 VDP_loadTileSet(bg_win_haohmaru_bga.tileset,gInd_tileset,DMA);
906 VDP_setTileMapEx(BG_A,bg_win_haohmaru_bga.tilemap,TILE_ATTR_FULL(PAL1,0,FALSE,FALSE,gInd_tileset),0,0,0,0,40,28,DMA_QUEUE);
907 PAL_setPalette(PAL1, bg_win_haohmaru_bga.palette->data, CPU);
908 gInd_tileset += bg_win_haohmaru_bga.tileset->numTile;
909 }
910 if(gWinnerID==2) //gillius
911 {
912 VDP_loadTileSet(bg_win_gillius_bga.tileset,gInd_tileset,DMA);
913 VDP_setTileMapEx(BG_A,bg_win_gillius_bga.tilemap,TILE_ATTR_FULL(PAL1,0,FALSE,FALSE,gInd_tileset),0,0,0,0,40,28,DMA_QUEUE);
914 PAL_setPalette(PAL1, bg_win_gillius_bga.palette->data, CPU);
915 gInd_tileset += bg_win_gillius_bga.tileset->numTile;
916 }
917
918 //Elementos Graficos
919 if(gWinnerID==1) //haohmaru
920 {
921 if(gPing2==0){
922 GE[1].sprite = SPR_addSpriteExSafe(&spr_haohmaru_win_phrase1A, 168, 40, TILE_ATTR(PAL3, FALSE, FALSE, FALSE), SPR_FLAG_AUTO_VISIBILITY | SPR_FLAG_AUTO_VRAM_ALLOC | SPR_FLAG_AUTO_TILE_UPLOAD | SPR_FLAG_AUTO_VRAM_ALLOC);
923 GE[2].sprite = SPR_addSpriteExSafe(&spr_haohmaru_win_phrase1B, 168, 112, TILE_ATTR(PAL3, FALSE, FALSE, FALSE), SPR_FLAG_AUTO_VISIBILITY | SPR_FLAG_AUTO_VRAM_ALLOC | SPR_FLAG_AUTO_TILE_UPLOAD | SPR_FLAG_AUTO_VRAM_ALLOC);
924 }
925 if(gPing2==1){
926 GE[1].sprite = SPR_addSpriteExSafe(&spr_haohmaru_win_phrase2A, 168, 40, TILE_ATTR(PAL3, FALSE, FALSE, FALSE), SPR_FLAG_AUTO_VISIBILITY | SPR_FLAG_AUTO_VRAM_ALLOC | SPR_FLAG_AUTO_TILE_UPLOAD | SPR_FLAG_AUTO_VRAM_ALLOC);
927 GE[2].sprite = SPR_addSpriteExSafe(&spr_haohmaru_win_phrase2B, 168, 112, TILE_ATTR(PAL3, FALSE, FALSE, FALSE), SPR_FLAG_AUTO_VISIBILITY | SPR_FLAG_AUTO_VRAM_ALLOC | SPR_FLAG_AUTO_TILE_UPLOAD | SPR_FLAG_AUTO_VRAM_ALLOC);
928 }
929 PAL_setPalette(PAL3, spr_haohmaru_win_phrase1A.palette->data, CPU);
930 }
931 if(gWinnerID==2) //gillius
932 {
933 if(gPing2==0){
934 GE[1].sprite = SPR_addSpriteExSafe(&spr_gillius_win_phrase1A, 168, 40, TILE_ATTR(PAL3, FALSE, FALSE, FALSE), SPR_FLAG_AUTO_VISIBILITY | SPR_FLAG_AUTO_VRAM_ALLOC | SPR_FLAG_AUTO_TILE_UPLOAD | SPR_FLAG_AUTO_VRAM_ALLOC);
935 GE[2].sprite = SPR_addSpriteExSafe(&spr_gillius_win_phrase1B, 168, 112, TILE_ATTR(PAL3, FALSE, FALSE, FALSE), SPR_FLAG_AUTO_VISIBILITY | SPR_FLAG_AUTO_VRAM_ALLOC | SPR_FLAG_AUTO_TILE_UPLOAD | SPR_FLAG_AUTO_VRAM_ALLOC);
936 }
937 if(gPing2==1){
938 GE[1].sprite = SPR_addSpriteExSafe(&spr_gillius_win_phrase2A, 168, 40, TILE_ATTR(PAL3, FALSE, FALSE, FALSE), SPR_FLAG_AUTO_VISIBILITY | SPR_FLAG_AUTO_VRAM_ALLOC | SPR_FLAG_AUTO_TILE_UPLOAD | SPR_FLAG_AUTO_VRAM_ALLOC);
939 GE[2].sprite = SPR_addSpriteExSafe(&spr_gillius_win_phrase2B, 168, 112, TILE_ATTR(PAL3, FALSE, FALSE, FALSE), SPR_FLAG_AUTO_VISIBILITY | SPR_FLAG_AUTO_VRAM_ALLOC | SPR_FLAG_AUTO_TILE_UPLOAD | SPR_FLAG_AUTO_VRAM_ALLOC);
940 }
941 PAL_setPalette(PAL3, spr_gillius_win_phrase1A.palette->data, CPU);
942 }
943
944 //Continue; Rematch
945 GE[3].sprite = SPR_addSpriteExSafe(&spr_continue, 54, 192, TILE_ATTR(PAL3, FALSE, FALSE, FALSE), SPR_FLAG_AUTO_VISIBILITY | SPR_FLAG_AUTO_VRAM_ALLOC | SPR_FLAG_AUTO_TILE_UPLOAD | SPR_FLAG_AUTO_VRAM_ALLOC);
946 GE[4].sprite = SPR_addSpriteExSafe(&spr_continue_yes, 190, 192, TILE_ATTR(PAL3, FALSE, FALSE, FALSE), SPR_FLAG_AUTO_VISIBILITY | SPR_FLAG_AUTO_VRAM_ALLOC | SPR_FLAG_AUTO_TILE_UPLOAD | SPR_FLAG_AUTO_VRAM_ALLOC);
947 GE[5].sprite = SPR_addSpriteExSafe(&spr_continue_no , 230, 192, TILE_ATTR(PAL3, FALSE, FALSE, FALSE), SPR_FLAG_AUTO_VISIBILITY | SPR_FLAG_AUTO_VRAM_ALLOC | SPR_FLAG_AUTO_TILE_UPLOAD | SPR_FLAG_AUTO_VRAM_ALLOC);
948 SPR_setDepth(GE[3].sprite, 255);
949 SPR_setDepth(GE[4].sprite, 1);
950 SPR_setDepth(GE[5].sprite, 1);
951 }
952
953 //Continue?
954 //"gContinueOption==0" NO
955 //"gContinueOption==1" YES
956 bool SoundContinueChoice = 0;
957 if(P[1].key_JOY_LEFT_status ==1 || P[2].key_JOY_LEFT_status ==1){ gContinueOption=1; SoundContinueChoice=1; }
958 if(P[1].key_JOY_RIGHT_status==1 || P[2].key_JOY_RIGHT_status==1){ gContinueOption=0; SoundContinueChoice=1; }
959 if(SoundContinueChoice==1){ XGM_setPCM(P1_SFX, snd_cursor, sizeof(snd_cursor)); XGM_startPlayPCM(P1_SFX, 1, SOUND_PCM_CH3); }
960 if(gContinueOption==1){
961 if(gPing10>=1 && gPing10<=6){ SPR_setVisibility(GE[4].sprite, VISIBLE); }
962 if(gPing10>=7 && gPing10<=9){ SPR_setVisibility(GE[4].sprite, HIDDEN ); }
963 SPR_setVisibility(GE[5].sprite, HIDDEN);
964 }
965 if(gContinueOption==0){
966 if(gPing10>=1 && gPing10<=6){ SPR_setVisibility(GE[5].sprite, VISIBLE); }
967 if(gPing10>=7 && gPing10<=9){ SPR_setVisibility(GE[5].sprite, HIDDEN ); }
968 SPR_setVisibility(GE[4].sprite, HIDDEN);
969 }
970 if(P[1].key_JOY_START_status==1 && gFrames>5)
971 {
972 CLEAR_VDP();
973 gFrames=0;
974 if(gContinueOption==0){ gRoom=2; }
975 if(gContinueOption==1){ gRoom=9; gDescompressionExit=10; }
976 };
977
978 }
979
980 //--- FINALIZACOES ---//
981 //VDP_showFPS(1); //Mostra a taxa de FPS
982 SPR_update(); //Atualiza (desenha) os sprites
983 SYS_doVBlankProcess(); //Wait for screen refresh and do all SGDK VBlank tasks
984 }
985
986 return 0;
987}

Este é o diagrama das funções utilizadas por essa função:

◆ PLAYER_STATE()

void PLAYER_STATE ( u8 Player,
u16 State )

Definição na linha 991 do arquivo main.c.

992{
993 SPR_releaseSprite(P[Player].sprite);
994 P[Player].animFrame = 1;
995 P[Player].frameTimeAtual = 1;
996 P[Player].dataAnim[1] = 1;
997 P[Player].animFrameTotal = 1;
998 P[Player].state = State;
999
1000 FUNCAO_PLAY_SND(Player, State); //SOUND; SFX!
1001
1002 /*samsho2*/
1003 // Evita o bug de sobrecarga de sprites, desabilitando o splash da onda.
1004 // O sprite da onda é desligado, caso:
1005 // * Debug esteja ativado
1006 // * PLAYERS soltem magias
1007 // * Golpes medios
1008 // * Golpes fortes
1009 // * Raiva
1010 if(
1011 gDebug==1 ||
1012 (State>=700 && State<=790) ||
1013 State==103 || State==106 ||
1014 State==102 || State==105 ||
1015 State==618
1016 ){
1017 if (GE[11].sprite){
1018 SPR_releaseSprite(GE[11].sprite);
1019 GE[11].sprite = NULL;
1020 }
1021 }
1022
1023 /*samsho2*/
1024 // Evita o bug de sobrecarga de sprites, desabilitando golpes (medio / forte) SIMULTANEOS do Gillius
1025 // Esta solucao é temporaria! :)
1026 if( (P[1].id==2 && P[2].id==2) && ((P[1].state==102 || P[1].state==103) && Player==2) && (State==102 || State==103) ){ State=101; }
1027 if( (P[1].id==2 && P[2].id==2) && ((P[2].state==102 || P[2].state==103) && Player==1) && (State==102 || State==103) ){ State=101; }
1028
1029 //virando de lado (mudanca de estado)
1030 if(Player==1 && P[1].direcao== 1 && P[2].x<P[1].x && State==100){ State=607; }
1031 if(Player==1 && P[1].direcao==-1 && P[1].x<P[2].x && State==100){ State=607; }
1032 if(Player==2 && P[2].direcao== 1 && P[1].x<P[2].x && State==100){ State=607; }
1033 if(Player==2 && P[2].direcao==-1 && P[2].x<P[1].x && State==100){ State=607; }
1034 if(Player==1 && P[1].direcao== 1 && P[2].x<P[1].x && State==200){ State=608; }
1035 if(Player==1 && P[1].direcao==-1 && P[1].x<P[2].x && State==200){ State=608; }
1036 if(Player==2 && P[2].direcao== 1 && P[1].x<P[2].x && State==200){ State=608; }
1037 if(Player==2 && P[2].direcao==-1 && P[2].x<P[1].x && State==200){ State=608; }
1038
1039 //--- DEBUG_CHARACTER_TEST ---// #ID:0
1040 if(P[Player].id==0)
1041 {
1042 if(State==100 || State==610){
1043 P[Player].y = gAlturaPiso;
1044 P[Player].w = 8;
1045 P[Player].h = 8;
1046 P[Player].axisX = P[Player].w/2;

1090 }
1091 if(State==102){

1106 }
1107 if(State==103){

1109 P[Player].h = 12*8;

1111 P[Player].axisY = (P[Player].h);

1114 P[Player].dataAnim[3] = 2;
